website_summaries.verdict: Orgain meal replacement shakes are ideal for those who prefer milk to soy and also seek truly organic ingredients.
pros: Emphasis on certified organic, non-GMO ingredients
cons: Flavor profile has changed over time, may include artificial sweeteners

customer_reviews.title: Need help contacting the owner: Received a bad batch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box last July 2016 and it has a good thru date of 02JUL2017. I recently opened one up and it is sludge and bitter and sour. I need help contacting the owner so I can report the batch number so that someone does not get sick and sue. Any help or advise would be most appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Sharu Verma

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lids.  R&D and QA need to do a better job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 cases. The product is good, but the packaging is flawed. Two of the cases I purchased all had defective lids in that there was no glue under the top part of the lid. So when I shook the container, chocolate liquid spewed all over the place as it leaked from the lid. In light of this, I have started a return for the last 2 cases and will switch products because it's a hassle have to send back food items. Too bad too because the product tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: apsilva

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great
customer_reviews.text: These used to be delicious but the last couple boxes have been horrible and I had to throw out. They were sour and curdled. Yuck. Something is wrong with the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Danisgoat

customer_reviews.title: Normally good, until this one shipment
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this current shipment had an aftertaste that was so nasty I couldn't drink it anymore. I thought it might just be the one bottle, but every bottle out of the pack was disgusting. I normally order this product and I don't know if it went bad due to heat but that's almost $50 dollars going into the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein shake, no nasty ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been drinking the chocolate fudge flavor for many, many years. The vanilla and strawberry flavors are also pretty good. It’s an excellent option for meals on the go, or when you’re just not that hungry. So much better for you than any of the other garbage protein shakes out there. I do occasionally get a spoiled one, but not often - and I drink them daily. We always do a “test” sip just to make sure. I think the quality control has improved, as it happens so rarely now. Also a great option for the elderly instead of the other well-known brands that are full of sugar and other nasty ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Roth

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: When you get a good batch, these shakes are delicious and stop the hunger pangs for a couple hours. But when you get a bad batch (as two of the last three deliveries were), they are undrinkable. The shakes with a pull date of 6-15-19 taste vaguely of bleach and nothing like chocolate. I have cancelled my subscription and am looking for a different shake.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for gaining weight and putting on muscle mass when you're older if you work out but if you are acne-prone watch out you will notice that you break out significantly with this product most of this stuff I found that I break out from when I stop within one week my skin improves so if you have acne-prone complexion even in your older years take heed! I however was very pleased with my muscle growth because of the high protein and extra calories I tend to have a very high metabolism and I have a hard time holding onto my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerate!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I think the ingredients are great. Many people complain about the lower protein content, but it’s perfect for me as I have to drink these at times when I’m on a liquid diet and many other drinks have too much protein to be a meal replacement. Yes, I do smell them before I drink one, and take a small sip. I have had issues with it spoiling prematurely, HOWEVER since I started refrigerating then, I have had no issues. Many complain about quality control, but it has amazing ingredients at an affordable price, so I don’t mind refrigerating it to avoid any issues. Tastes great, very chocolatey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordinarily I would give this a good rating, however...
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this product for years. However, the last shipment, several of my shakes tasting like someone poured gasoline into the containers. I actually was scared because I took a big gulp of the first one and swallowed it. I then slowly tased a few other and at least two more from the 12 pack was the same. No exaggeration here - they tasked like gasoline or some horrible chemical. I returned them and was issued a credit. Not sure if I will get these again any time soon. Just wondering what this could have been.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Normally these are my favorite protein shakes but I bought a box in July and they were bad in less than a month. I drank several of them with no issues but after a couple weeks they had gone sour. The flavor was like yogurt. I have to say I was very disappointed as Orgain has been my go to shake for quite a while now. I've seen a number of similar reviews which has made me hesitant to keep buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Dead bugs
customer_reviews.text: I've drank these FOREVER. These shakes ARE amazing. I ordered a new flavor today and there were dead bugs all over the cartons, stuck around the lid where your lips go and inside the protein shake box. Did not even bother to open one up to taste. Completely disgusted by the integrity of the package. Never seen this before in my life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were spoiled.
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these and am happy with them, but this case I got was bad and made me sick. It tasted like spoiled milk. After, reading the other reviews about spoiled product I'm afraid to ever buy this again. I was a monthly customer before this. Spoiled products are not acceptable. I have an auto-immune problem and spoiled food could result in my being sick for a very long time. I'm so grossed out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and pretty tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an extended 12 day festival camping experience. I hate camp cooking in the heat of the day and these kept me from tearing myself too badly. In the past I would have just had coffee for breakfast and not bothered with food until I was starving in the late afternoon. These are a great solution as they are shelf stable, have a good amount of protein and calories and require zero effort. Great for busy folks on the go, job sites without a refrigerator, or a little festival self care!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bidnes

customer_reviews.title: Good most of the time but beware....
customer_reviews.text: It's good most of the time , but you will get spoiled ones I'm not sure why. So be cautious and don't gulp until you know. Because it is disgusting when you do so. I was advised to drink these pregnant and I took one sip and wanted to die. I hope they figure it out. Because they are great beside the spoil and curd ones. Yuck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste - bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: These had a very weird taste. I wonder if I got a bad batch, I have tried other Orgain products and liked them. I just found these undrinkable. Beware of buying these online I suppose. Would be great if orgain could prove me wrong by sending a new batch! As it is I have to throw these all away I think.
customer_reviews.author: Steeen

customer_reviews.title: Used to be amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this product ...slight addiction I think!! Lately, the taste seems different - like I can detect the container taste (plastic coating? not sure). I believe in the past they changed the formula slightly - which I adjusted to - but this taste a little like synthetic chemical. Perhaps the product sits in a hot warehouse and the container material leaches into the drink? In all fairness - my daughter doesn't detect it to the degree that I do. But - she also isn't an Orgain connoisseur! I was hoping this was a fluke - but this has now been the case with orders from Amazon, Target and even at Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting curdled shake
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried these but my friend had recommended them to me. I bought a case of chocolate and a case of vanilla. Opened the first chocolate one and took a sip and almost gagged. It was disgusting and had chunks in it. I didn’t even want to try a different one. I opened the vanilla and it was pretty tasty and smooth. I don’t want to have to pay to send this case back but not sure what else I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: One of the few organic protein drinks I could find that does NOT have any alternative sweeteners. This brand also makes a drink with Stevia, but I can't stand alternative sweeteners and I'm so glad I found this one. It tastes good and is a lifesaver for me to get some good energy and nutrition on the go. Plus, this package is a great deal per individual drink than the grocery store. I keep them in the fridge and enjoy them cold. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: ogreen32

customer_reviews.title: 22% Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this had so much sugar in it ....... to be honest it taste just like the chocolate milk Yoo-hoo
customer_reviews.author: Exotika.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & very healthy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this shake. When my husband was receiving chemo (each session lasted 6 hours), this was his go-to mini-meal. We still use it when we're too busy to pack/bring food with us while driving 40 minutes to & from doctor appointment, etc.
customer_reviews.author: White Dove

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff! Ingredients are relatively clean, considering a premade shake is by definition a processed food. Very filling and good tasting. I buy both the orgain premade shakes and the powder and actually prefer the taste of the premade shakes because they don’t have stevia. Good replacement for breakfast or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but recently they are spoiled
customer_reviews.text: We have been drinking these for years but it appears that Amazon might want to provide some type of additional protection from the heat by providing products that are milk based. We have had MANY spoiled containers in the last several months and it is literally pouring money down the drain. Amazon offers the best price. They are literally 3x as much at the grocery store. I am sure it's due to sitting outside in the heat when delivered. None the less, maybe provide a cool wrap packaging inside the box?
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Taste has changed, tastes like plastic now :(
customer_reviews.text: I've been a consistent buyer of these shakes for over 3 years. Unfortunately, something has changed in the taste. It has a horrible, chemical, plastic aftertaste that just doesn't sit well with me. I suspect it's something to do with container and not the actual recipe and ingredients but I'm not sure. It's enough to cancel a subscription that I've had for over a year and return the rest of my unopened shakes. It's too bad because I used to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best protein shake out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is some good stuff! I have been drinking it for a while, and use it mainly for breakfast and post workout. When I consume for breakfast I also add a handful of fruit with a tablespoon of peanut butter. It's perfect and keeps me full for 4 to 5 hours until lunch. The seller is also great. I once got some that were fermented and they quickly sent me a replacement and set up a driver to pick up the box that was fermented. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Best premade protein shake on the market.  Convenient and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality premade protein shake on the market. Soylent, which i used to love, contains canola oil which is an inflammatory and not good for you. This product has that same filling quality while tasting great. A little pricey but still cheaper than soylent. My only gripe is with orgains nomenclature/color coding system. Product that have a similar color label can be completely different products. This one is the best ive tried thusfar. Great for dieters and post workout shakes!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Only order chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with the vanilla flavor. The bad taste is not present in the Chocolate flavor. Now what do I do with 11 of the vanilla. Can't swallow it. Chocolate is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B. Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Soured product! Not happy!😡
customer_reviews.text: I order 3 cases a month..so far 4 drinks were spoiled..in the last 2 months..I'm NOT happy..too expensive for soured product. Update: another sour one this order..one more and I'm cancelling my subscription!
customer_reviews.author: mfahrney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My husband whom has been getting chemo, doctors wanted him to drink ensure , but ever time he drank he was sick to stomach, I remembered getting this product, long story he do get sick with this so I’ll pay extra for this I’m so proud I remembered and he can drink without being sick to stomach and it’s helping him get better keeping his energy up. Thanks wanted to share
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Lippard

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, nutritious stuff,
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, nutritious stuff, and the best price I've found anywhere. I kind of hate getting things from Amazon instead of helping real live stores stay in business, but the only store I've seen carry Orgain nutrition shakes (at a much higher price) is Whole Foods, and they are the Amazon of brick-and-mortar stores, so I figure what the hell. Orgain is great, though - either by itself or as the base for a good chocolatey (or vanilla-y or banana-y or strawberry-y) nutritious smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: K. Highfield

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor & ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I struggle with a low appetite sometimes & can't force anything heavy down. I went with the double fudge since I figured it would likely give the most chocolatey flavor that you can get from such a drink. I was right, flavor has a decent chocolate base without being chalky at all. I also appreciate the organic ingredients & the amount of nutrition within the drink. It's a winner for me, I'll continue to buy them on here as long as product & price stays consistent!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste has gone downhill recently
customer_reviews.text: The taste recently has gone downhill. I’ve ordered it for a number of months. With my last three orders, the taste has been different. We’ve haven’t drank any of them and stopped my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Consistency of quality is fluctuating badly recently. I just recieved a 2 cases of spoiled ones.
customer_reviews.text: received 2 12 packs the 18th of July, had some left over from my last subscribe and save order, both the cases I received the 18th are bad. One has weird flavor and in the other case the cartons were swelled up and tight with internal pressure. They were all spoiled/curdled. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Reedy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shake
customer_reviews.text: Yummy shake with no chemicals, great for kids or adults. A good quick option in a pinch. Love the chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.author: kerrin marie griffin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay
customer_reviews.text: These are good for meal replacement and I have them for breakfast. They do leave a little aftertaste in your mouth but a stick of gum gets rid of that. If you're not used to eating raw vegetables regularly you might need to use the restroom soon after drinking the shake (from my personal experience). Nice that they're organic and Non-GMO.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. It’s definitely milk based!
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately didn’t realize it was dairy based since I typed in Vegan in the search engine... but I did taste it, it’s creamy and rich in chocolate... I instantly knew it was dairy after first sip. This was totally my fault, I was looking through for half an hour at different shakes. So many of them were vegan I just assumed. If not vegan you will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You will get bad ones!
customer_reviews.text: Be VERY CAREFUL! It’s so frustrating because these taste amazing and can be a great product but I almost always get one bad one and it’s curdled and DISGUSTING!! I accidentally just drank a big drink and it was SOUR!! So gross!! It ruins the entire batch because you’re scared they’ll be bad. When they’re good they’re amazing otherwise. I don’t know just make sure you smell them or check them before drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hills

customer_reviews.title: Very good, delicious, and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Very impressed with quality and flavor. You just have to keep a close eye on the state of delivery and packaging, as the bottles it comes in are quite fragile. When they arrive intact though - excellent stuff. Better than other nutritional shakes by a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It’s a crapshoot!
customer_reviews.text: Beware- I tried 1st one which was fine. 2nd shake was one I tried to drink at a meeting and had to get up and spew it into the trash on the first gulp. It was sour and tasted like drinking vomit. Horrible trying to get the taste out- nothing worked for a good 30 minutes. Gag me!
customer_reviews.author: angela davis

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Missing some important vitamins, high sugar. Premium Protein much better & other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but occasionally defective
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I’ve enjoyed these shakes for a year, but I’ve recently had two bottles - in two separate batches - where the TetraPak was swollen and bloated with curdled milk inside. Orgain should check up on their manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: These shakes taste great and are healthier and better tasting than most shakes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a busy life and a hard time getting enough protien in my diet. These shakes taste great and are healthier and better tasting than most shakes I've tried. I always have one of these in my purse. The taste great even at room temp and they are a nice, fast way to get nutrients when you don't have time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Beachlover27

customer_reviews.title: BAD LOT OF SHAKES!!!!! Looked like CURTLED MILK!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these shakes. Then....THIS happened....new box shown above with now 2 out of 3 were chunky and obviously BAD!!!! OMG....I even took a drink of the first one before I noticed it was bad!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Battle

customer_reviews.title: Decreased my appetite
customer_reviews.text: I had to increase my protein intake prior to surgery, drank 3-4 per day,honestly my appetite decreased when drinking these. Great tasting product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: 1-2 Spoiled from Each Box
customer_reviews.text: Usually 1 or 2 of the drinks in the box, each time they're shipped, taste like spoiled milk and have to be thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good basic shake with no weirdness
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with non-nutritive sweeteners (both artificial sweeteners and stevia, monkfruit and the like), so finding a protein shake that's just sweetened with sugar is big for me. It definitely tastes like a nutritional shake but it's pleasant and drinkable, convenient for busy days, and doesn't make me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Kid-approved.
customer_reviews.text: My pediatrician recommended that my daughter start drinking these so she can gain some weight. She actually loves them. At first she said they were too chocolatey, but now she's fine with it. They taste better cold, like all protein drinks. And I love that they are organic and give her the extra protein and vitamins she needs. We will definitely be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Can get pricey, but much better than rivals
customer_reviews.text: I was instructed to drink these by my gastroenterologist to help me stay nourished during UC flares. Ended up incorporating it into my diet in order as I decided to incorporate softer, less-abrasive foods. Can't beat this product when it comes to flavor. It can definitely get pricey, but if you subscribe, you can save quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Must have lol
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I have to have this lol or at least my body thinks so. I feel good! Definitely a daily in my life.
customer_reviews.author: S. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Moldy bad kid’s shake- GROSS
customer_reviews.text: Gross. Just poured some for my toddler and it came out chunky, coagulated mess with a rotten smell. DISGUSTING. Not purchasing again. Dating on product indicates it should still be fine for 10 more months. Lies.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I have been making some unhealthy eating decisions after my schedule changed recently. I was really expecting them to be your average meal replacement shake, but they really were much better than expected. You know that odd aftertaste you get when drinking most of the name brand meal replacements out there, the one that lets you know what you're drinking is definitely not natural? It doesn't seem to have that. Some people describe chalkiness to it, but I didn't find it bad at all, if you set your expectations correctly. These are quite expensive when compared to other products you'll find at the grocery store, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I don't get what's up with the reviews saying the product arrived spoiled or damaged. I order at least two cartoons a month for the past few years and have never experienced any problem. It is a lot cheaper here than at the grocery store. I buy it for my husband, a cancer survivor, who doesn't always eat as he should. He loves the chocolate fudge.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel101

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to this! I have to have one every morning. Delicious and healthy ingredients - no artificial anything, and packed with protein. I tried the Protein version and did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mare S

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar and carbs
customer_reviews.text: 11g added Sugar, 32g of carbs is too high for a healthy meal replacement. They need to maybe up the fat and protein and take out the added sugar. There are plenty of great tasting products on the market that do not have that much added sugar. 44 calories of pure sugar basically? That should be coming from protein not added sugar. If you drank 3 of these a day thinking you would lose weight, you're in for a rude surprise.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Busted and leaking box
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived broken, but taped back together as you can see in the pictures. Before even opening the box there’s a sour smell. When I opened the box there were broken and leaking cartons. We’ve ordered these several times before and this is the first time we’ve ever received a box like this.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Struwe

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting meal replacement drink
customer_reviews.text: So happy I discovered this after forcing myself to drink Ensure, Boost, and others whenever I had to resort to liquid meals. I much prefer chocolate or vanilla Orgaine. They don’t have the chemical aftertaste I found in other brands. I enjoy adding peppermint Italian syrup or other flavors for variety. It satisfies my need for food without leaving me feeling bloated. I like that it doesn’t include soy.
customer_reviews.author: Critical consumer

customer_reviews.title: No Artificial.  Best sha
customer_reviews.text: Best meal replacement shake there is, if you are allergic Artificial sweeteners like I am. This is good. I have checked all too.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and fulfilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shakes to drink for after having some extensive surgery. I was positive I wasn't going to have much of an appetite and wanted something to keep me full but easy to consume. These had a great rich chocolate taste and better than some of the other shakes I have tried. The consistency was great as well, not too thick like yogurt but also not too thin like water. Kept me full and was all I had for the first few days after surgery. I used the leftover for days that I didn't want to have a heavy meal or was in a hurry and again, it filled me up. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nestormoscozo

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, quality control needed.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have a subscription to receive two boxes once a month. However, every single time, one of the shakes is spoiled. It is a really unpleasant surprise and has been happening consistently for probably a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple of years now and everything was good until my last auto-delivery
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these shakes for a couple of years now and everything was good until my last auto-delivery. Taste is different, definitely is not the same I'm used to and I don't think it's just a bad batch since the same happened with the Orgain's plant-based shakes, they changed the ingredients; I think they did the same for this one with milk protein.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with these drinks. They are tasty and arrived so quick I get to take them to work now. I was getting a store brand nutrition shake from the drug store but plant proteins are essential to your health so decided to try these. Really pleased with everything!
customer_reviews.author: gina votruba

customer_reviews.title: Great for gastroparesis patients
customer_reviews.text: This drink is very expensive but it's the only think my daughter can consume without vomiting. This company is talking all my $ but that's a small price to pay for my daughter's life.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good for after workout!
customer_reviews.text: If I know I am not having a meal after my workout, I put one in the freezer before my workout and enjoy it super cold after a vigorous shaking to make sure it's mixed well! Taste is good considering I am not a fan of powders! Keeps you satiated as well!
customer_reviews.author: optimusm07

customer_reviews.title: This stuff tastes amazing and keeps you full
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this a shot as a quick breakfast/lunch when I'm on the go that is still nutritious. I honestly wasn't expecting much as far as taste, but it is delicious! It has also done a great job of keeping me full until lunchtime. I'm very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Orgain, please read these reviews and correct the spoilage.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff but as other reviews I have stated, there are clumps or spoiled units every once in a while. It is not because the units are out of date, and I’m not certain what causes it but they really need to figure this out. I love the stuff and do not want to stop drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my elderly parent who likes the taste of this shake, and keeps a few stocked in the refrigerator for those days when he doesn't feel like cooking, or when he needs a nutrition boost. This Orgain Organic Nutritional Shake has much 'cleaner' and healthy ingredients than some of those highly marketed nutrition shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy with clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink Premier Protein until I learned the Ingredients aren’t good for you. At first the switch was hard because they taste different but it didn’t take long until I prefer this one. Yummy and has clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Its simply great!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Its actually what i was looking for. It has all the vitamins i need, because im very busy, i skip meals, so at times it replaces meals.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: i have used this product for 3 years. Automatic delivery from Amazon. I like the taste,etc. BUT I have to struggle to open the cardboard container the 12 pak comes in. Isn't there any simpler, easy to open box for ladies over 85?? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: The people I got this for liked them- post workout. They liked the flavor. Sadly NOT dairy free.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy business owners
customer_reviews.text: Being a business owner and always meeting the demands head first leaves little time in the morning for eating breakfast. These have been great to grab right out of the fridge and jumping in the truck to work all day.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Teirra Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: When I came across this product I was very skeptical -- I usually hate shakes because of the awaful after tast and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something healthy to drink that was organiz and had natural ingredients. When I came across this product I was very skeptical -- I usually hate shakes because of the awaful after tast and the artificial tasting flavors. I drank my first Orgain skake (chocolate flavor) this morning with Ice and it was absolutely delicious. I'm amazed how good it taste and I feel good drinking knowing it doesn't have crap and fillers in it. Definitely going to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: JAYSIN

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste, and organic
customer_reviews.text: I drink these shakes in the morning when I'm in a hurry. I used to drink Optimum Nutrition shakes, but I just feel better about drinking these so frequently. Taste is a 4/5, but add +0.5 because you know it's organic and not too bad for you. At $2.15 per container, I'd say it's reasonably priced considering the ingredients. My only issue is that approximately 2 out of the 12 containers will inevitably not open correctly when I open it, i.e. the inner seal doesn't open, and I have to stick a knife inside to break the seal. Also, probably about 1.5oz gets stuck inside the container due to the Tetrapak design.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: BEST TASTING_ COMPLETE NOT JUST PROTEIN
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all of the Complete Nutritional Products: this taste the best, hands down. Texture good/smooth. The others had a gritty-type texture or gave me GI problems. I trust the sources of protein are "wholesome"; (there is a spooky new process of extracting protein from PLANTS that is like silly putty & gets stuck in your colon...) They will advertise "from plant sources"... While I'm lactose intolerant (carbo), I do not have a problem with casein protein. I like this best. Chocolate is fav but other flavors good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Kirts

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: My husband opened a bottle and it was curdled. I wish I knew how I could get a refund on this. It's not worth it to fight and try to send it back though. Just be aware before you take a swig of it. Make sure you check it and smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Some are bad.
customer_reviews.text: I get 3 12 packs a month (36 singles) and usually at least one is bad. Then it was sometimes 2 that were bad. This time it was 3 that were bad. Carton puffed out, extremely thick and smells bad. I can't keep ordering these if I have to keep throwing some away. They are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Young

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE AND FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Very creamy and not too sweet or heavy chocolate. Prefer to drink it cold!
customer_reviews.author: Marchael

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Me
customer_reviews.text: Everyone’s body is different. May work great for some, not so great for others. I find it helpful in curbing my appetite while giving me protein and nutrients. Easy to carry and it tastes pretty good. Just not five star good.
customer_reviews.author: rbr

customer_reviews.title: Great Shake
customer_reviews.text: Running away from Atkins FAKEShakes as soon as I could, I wanted something more natural to feel good about what I was putting in my body. I found these by chance at a Natural Foods Co-Op in my hometown and found these to "buy in bulk". I have also tried the Strawberries and Cream and enjoy those as well (though not as much since its more Cream and a little bit of Strawberry). The chocolate is very tasty and smooth. They are not as chocolatey as the Atkins which I would've liked more but I really feel a lot better about what is going in my body with these. Would recommend and will re-buy when I am out.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They help me maintain weight. I drink one after breakfast and dinner. I’m also trying to gain weight. I wish they weren’t so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Maryam A

customer_reviews.title: Check Product Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time i received a box of the vanilla flavor that would expire within a week. This time im returning it. The box itself was badly damaged and had to have been done before even being put inside a ups box. Really annoying that they don't check their product expiration dates before mailing out or removing them from the possibility if mailing out.
customer_reviews.author: SAD

customer_reviews.title: From nutritional supplement to post-gym snack
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased these because I was working 2 jobs each day and knew I wasn't getting all my vitamins and macros for the day. Now I use it for post-workout and I can say that in the area of flavor, content, and fullness-feeling(?) it certainly satisfies. It's smooth without being too sweet or thick. The fact that it's organic ingredients gives me peace of mind and I don't feel like I'm still starving after my work-outs. These are sold in several stores so if you can find cheaper, go right ahead and test it out but there are coupons occasionally on Amazon which makes the purchase decision much easier.
customer_reviews.author: A Fish

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. In addition to adding more calories and nutrition to my diet, it's not too heavy on the "sweet" factor . At 250 calories, I could easily drink 2 a day and not go over my caloric needs. Highly recommend this for the nutrition and taste!
customer_reviews.author: Jess I.

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my elderly mother who does not have the best appetite or nutrition on her own. She was drinking Glucerna before which is just junk.This shake has good nutritional content with actual food like kale, but still has a nice chocolate taste. I bought her the plant-based version (my preference) and she liked it but prefers the dairy version, although she admitted the taste difference was minor.
customer_reviews.author: holland1

customer_reviews.title: I have a hard time eating when I'm busy so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time eating when I'm busy so these definitely help. I'm not going to lie the flavor can be a little bland (like hot chocolate made with skim milk or water instead of whole milk), but it has WAY healthier ingredients than Ensure or Boost and has helped me gain some much needed weight.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the vanilla shake. But the chocolate one I have to force myself to finish. It's bitter and has a weird texture unlike the vanilla that is smooth. The nutrition is there, yes. But it is not enjoyable to drink
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Slightly pricey but excellent flavor, particularly because it is not sickly sweet ...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly pricey but excellent flavor, particularly because it is not sickly sweet like other protein shakes sweetened with Stevia and various other over the top sweetening agents. Wish it had more fiber (only 2 grams per bottle) but has a good balance of nutritional components. Personally, I think the chocolate is by far the best, following by the vanilla. Mocha is okay, never had the strawberry.
customer_reviews.author: R Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy one daily for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Contains some sugar but sure are good. Ignore the negative reviews. I've bought them for months since December 2019 and they're always great. Best very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sd

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Grateful!
customer_reviews.text: This drink has been extremely helpful with my nutrition and diet since recovering from surgery. It does not contain the artificial ingredients like some other nutritional protein brands and does not upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Pawnee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed with this shipment
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this shipment. Half of them were rotten. Little pieces were coming out as you poured them and they had a bad smell. Will never purchase again. I used to love these, but i guess I will have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: I have just completed cancer treatments, and my nutritionist recommended this product! I have more energy and it has many of the nutrients I need in it for my daily nutritional requirements. This product has the best flavor of any of the nutritional shakes I have purchased anywhere, and is plant based. I have even recommended it to several of my friends! This is definitely a five star star product, in my opinion, because it was developed by a doctor who actually had cancer himself. I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: AZGuy

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled Shake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in May and typically love them. I drank about 1/2 of them with no problem. Grabbed one today after a workout and it was spoiled! I had to spit it out and it made me so ill! I’m so disappointed I really enjoy these shakes. I checked the date and they are good until May 2021. I’m past the return window unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My preferred chocolate protein drink
customer_reviews.text: According to some reviews I've read, the formula has changed for the worse, but I wasn't familiar with it before, although I feel I would have preferred it because I like less processed and natural ingredients. I realize this is a processed product, so my expectations are not very high to begin with. I bought this mainly because I wanted to gain muscle weight, and as a vegetarian, I was having a difficult time doing so. I also drink it because I'm too lazy to prepare my own shake more often than not. I like the chocolate flavor and it's not so thick and gooey like other protein drinks, it's more like plain chocolate milk.
customer_reviews.author: iGUANA

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a breakfast If I’m not very hungry or post workout! They taste decent considering it’s a protein shake. And it isn’t super thick like some other ones I’ve tried. I will continue to buy these ones!
customer_reviews.author: kirstin james

customer_reviews.title: FAMILY AND GRANDKIDS LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep in the house everyone loves this so much. And price is great. Also have on hand as our go to drink if there is an earthquake. Could live off this alone for days.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, Plant-Based Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: I'm an active woman with a relatively high metabolism, and sometimes I need something extra to supplement my diet so I maintain my weight. This product and its ingredients are much better than Ensure or Boost. It tastes good enough and does what I need it to do. I'm a regular customer.
customer_reviews.author: AliV

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the version with stevia. 32 carbs per serving.
customer_reviews.text: These shakes have a wonderful, clean taste and lots of vitamins. However, I didn't realize that this version has a lot of sugar. I was used to the 10 carb version with stevia (blue and white packaging). I have tried lots of other protein shakes and they pale in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: guriausa

customer_reviews.title: After weeks of not being allowed to eat anything this was the perfect food.
customer_reviews.text: This product literally saved my life after nearly dying in the hospital due to a doctors mistake. An NP suggested I try it and gave me her shake from her lunch. After weeks of not being allowed to eat anything this was the perfect food....and it still is, I like it for lunch or when I'm busy at work. Mother-in-law likes it too, keeps her protein levels up. GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT TASTE, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: NMVaquera

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: This protein shake tastes so good it's hard to believe it's good for you. It's creamy, rich and not too sweet, filled with a chocolaty mouth feel. I've tried most of the other protein shakes on the market - none of them come close to the flavor, texture and the boost of energy I get after drinking it. It's part of my daily routine and is an excellent substitute for a quick meal on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Margo M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived taped up
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the shakes- good flavor, good price, good nutrition. However, it arrived opened and taped up. The package of shakes was somewhat damaged. Not sure if someone purchased and returned or if the package was damaged in warehouse and taped. Either way, Amazon usually has better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: My lunch backup plan
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a meal replacement. I went from drinking Ensure for lunch or after a workout to going to this product. The taste is similar, but I believe Orgain had more in the bottle with similar calories. Due to sugar content, I recommend possibly trying the vegan version instead. I still like this product though and would recommend it to anyone looking for a quick lunch or after workout drink. Chocolate and the iced mocha tasted good to me.
customer_reviews.author: W.

product_meta.title: Orgain Organic Nutritional Shake, Creamy Chocolate Fudge - Meal Replacement, 16g Protein, 21 Vitamins & Minerals, Gluten Free, Soy Free, Kosher, Non-GMO, 11 Ounce, 12 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:Shake, Chocolate FudgeOrgain Organic Creamy Chocolate Fudge Nutrition Shakes are a naturally delicious on the go nourishment drink with 16 grams of organic protein, 21 vitamins and minerals and 10 fruits and vegetables per serving. USDA organic, gluten free, vegetarian, non GMO, soy free. No artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. Great for both men and women, this is the perfect high protein nutritional drink for meal replacement or post workout. Ingredients: Filtered Water, Orgain Organic Protein Blend (Grass Fed Organic Milk Protein Concentrate, Organic Whey Protein Concentrate), Organic Cane Sugar, Organic Brown Rice Syrup, Organic Rice Dextrins, Organic High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Organic Alkalized Cocoa, Organic Natural Flavors, Organic Rice Bran Extract, Orgain Vitamin & Minerals Blend (Sodium Ascorbate, Magnesium Sulfate, Zinc Gluconate, DL-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Niacinamide, Vitamin A Palmitate, Potassium Iodide, Copper Gluconate, Biotin, Calcium D-Pantothenate, Cyanocobalamin, Cholecalciferol, Folic Acid, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin), Trisodium Phosphate, Potassium Chloride, Tricalcium Phosphate, Tripotassium Citrate, Gellan Gum, Sea Salt, Organic Inulin, Organic Locust Bean Gum, Orgain Organic Fruit Blend Powder (Organic Acai, Organic Apple, Organic Banana, Organic Blueberry, Organic Raspberry), Orgain Organic Veggie Blend Powder (Organic Tomato, Organic Spinach, Organic Beet, Organic Carrot, Organic Kale), Natural Flavor.
feature_bullets: Includes 12 (11 ounce) ready to drink orgain organic nutrition creamy chocolate fudge all in one nutritional shakes

16 grams of organic protein (from organic whey protein concentrate and organic grass fed milk protein concentrate), 2 grams of dietary fiber, 21 vitamins and minerals, 10 fruits and vegetables (including acai, spinach, kale), 250 calories per serving
USDA organic, gluten free, vegetarian, kosher, non GMO, soy free, carrageenan free, free of antibiotics and hormones; No artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives
Good source of vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin B12, calcium, phosphorus, riboflavin, niacin, folate, iodine, pantothenic acid, magnesium, zinc, and copper

Ideal for healthy, on the go nourishment for men and women; These are great as a supplement to your diet and nutrition needs and perfect for busy lifestyles, meal replacement, a quick breakfast or snack, on the go meals, and pre or post workouts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
